listitem.para: The XML data is validated against the XML-Schema of an OrganizationalUnit.
The following consistency checks are made:
The name is unique in relation to the name of every other sibling OrganizationalUnit.
The links to the parent ous are referencing OrganizationalUnits.
An OrganizationalUnit is created from the provided data including a generated internal id.
The status of the new OrganizationalUnit is set to "opened".
Creator and creation date are added to the new OrganizationalUnit.
The new OrganizationalUnit is stored.
The XML representation for the stored OrganizationalUnit is created.
The XML data is returned.
